Workload_Description: Edit and manage Excel files with seamless Fabric Lakehouse integration.
Workload_Hub_Workload_Slogan: The powerful way to edit Excel files directly in Microsoft Fabric.
Workload_Hub_Workload_Description:
Excel Editor brings advanced Excel editing capabilities directly into Microsoft Fabric. Connect to your Lakehouses, query data with Spark, and create dynamic Excel files.

**You can:**

• Create and edit Excel files with real Lakehouse data
• Pre-warm Spark sessions for instant query execution
• Download Excel files with live data from your tables
• Seamlessly integrate with Fabric workspaces and items
HelloWorldItem_Description: A Hello World Item to start your Dev Experience
ExcelEditItem_Description: Advanced Excel editing and data manipulation with Lakehouse integration
